mapper.select: select task.*, userid, username,usernickname from task, user where task.task_publisher = user.userid and task_status=#{task_status} order by task.task_id, user.userid order by task.task_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into task(task_name, task_detail, task_publisher) values(#{task_name}, #{task_detail}, #{userid})
mapper.delete: delete from task where task_name=#{task_name} and task_id=#{task_id}
mapper.update: update task set task_name = #{task_name}, task_detail = #{task_detail}, updatetime = now() where task_id=#{task_id}
update task set task_status = #{task_status_new} where task_id = #{task_id}
